sentences.en: At bottom, such an attitude is born not of concern for your welfare, but out of fear of losing you.
sentences.cn: 实际上，这种态度并非源自对你幸福的关心，而是出于害怕失去你。

sentences.en: Athens was suffering under the rule of an oligarchy that had no concern for the people's welfare.
sentences.cn: 雅典当时饱受寡头集团的统治，他们对人民的福祉毫不关心。

sentences.en: Child welfare services are well established and comprehensive.
sentences.cn: 儿童福利机构发展成熟、体系完善。

sentences.en: Don't turn a blind eye to matters that concern the people's welfare.
sentences.cn: 不要对民众的利益漠然置之.

sentences.en: He professed a great interest in my welfare.
sentences.cn: 他明白表示非常关心我的幸福.

sentences.en: He wanted to command nature for the service and welfare of man.
sentences.cn: 他想以掌握自然来服务并造福于人类.

sentences.en: I felt a conscientious solicitude for Adele's welfare and progress.
sentences.cn: 对于阿德尔斯的幸福和进步,我感到一种出于天良的关心.

sentences.en: I want to work, I don't want to be on welfare.
sentences.cn: 我想去工作，不想吃救济。

sentences.en: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.cn: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

sentences.en: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.the provision of education and welfare services
sentences.cn: 提供教育和福利服务

sentences.en: People looked out for one another and were concerned about the welfare of their fellows.
sentences.cn: 人们守望相助，关心着彼此的幸福。

sentences.en: The Authority will provide a welfare worker to assist you.
sentences.cn: 当局会派一名义工来帮助你。

sentences.en: The company’s welfare officer deals with employees’ personal problems.
sentences.cn: 公司负责福利的工作人员处理雇员的个人问题。

sentences.en: The orphans in the welfare home receive food, medical treatment and education.
sentences.cn: 该院对孤儿采取供养 、 治疗、教育的方针.

sentences.en: the provision of education and welfare services
sentences.cn: 提供教育和福利服务

sentences.en: The welfare of a child should always override the wishes of its parents.
sentences.cn: 孩子的幸福安康应该永远比父母的愿望来得更重要。

sentences.en: They are concerned about my welfare.
sentences.cn: 他们关心我的健康.

sentences.en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentences.cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentences.en: Those bastards don't care a damn about the welfare of the factory!
sentences.cn: 这批狗养的,不顾大局!

sentences.en: We are concerned about the child's welfare.
sentences.cn: 我们关注那个孩子的福祉。

phrases.tran_cn: 接受福利救济的：因贫困而经常从政府或私人机构处接受定期帮助的
公共福利，公用福利设施；社会福利
社会福利；社会福利工作（等于social work）
社会福利函数；社会福利功能

trans.tran_en: Welfare services are provided to help with people's living conditions and financial problems

trans.tran_cn: 幸福，安全与健康，福利，(美国)社会保障金
trans.tran_en: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness
